CustomField.description: This field stores status of each expense request. If the status is "New", it means expense request is not submitted for approval and is open. If the status is "Submitted", it means expense request is submitted for approval and is pending for approval from manager. If the status is "Approved, it means the expense request is approved by manager. If the status is "Rejected", it means the expense request is rejected by manager.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field stores status of each expense request. If the status is "New", it means expense request is not submitted for approval and is open. If the status is "Submitted", it means expense request is submitted for approval and is pending for approval from manager. If the status is "Approved, it means the expense request is approved by manager. If the status is "Rejected", it means the expense request is rejected by manager.
CustomField.label: Status
